title: Crontab jobs (.sh scripts)
body: I was trying to schedule jobs in crontab (.sh script) but it's not working so far. My idea is to improve it because for now it does nothing

comments.body: This, or systemd timers. It could be implemented on top of `Task Scheduler`
I would love to see a crontab which would either be a standalone feature or a some sort of link to windows scheduled tasks.
